en.emailConfirmation: Email confirmation has been sent to
en.defendedText1: You must now submit the 'answer to a divorce application' form. The deadline for the court to receive this is 21 days from the date you first signed in to respond to the application.
en.defendedText2: Download and fill in the paper form.
en.defendedText4: You'll have to pay a £{{ feesDefendDivorce }} fee when you submit the form.
en.defendedText5: You may have to go to a hearing to discuss your answer with a judge.
en.defendedText6: If you don't submit your answer before the deadline, the applicant can continue the divorce as if you hadn't said that you intended to defend the divorce.
en.ifYouNeedHelpText: You can contact the divorce centre if you need help. Court staff can’t give you legal advice however, and you should speak to a solicitor or legal adviser.
en.helpImproveText: Please help us improve this service by leaving your feedback.
